root.name: Legends of Wrestling
root.description: Legends of Wrestling was first released in 2001 on the Playstation 2, Xbox and the Gamecube. Published by Acclaim Entertainment the game featured a variety of legendary wrestlers from all the major wrestling organisations. The game brought the player back to a time where wrestling was run throughout different territories across America and you visited each region with your chosen superstar and competed in various matches in an attempt to become champion.The huge roster featured a who's who of wrestling superstars:Hulk HoganBret HartRob Van DamRicky SteamboatJerry LawlerTed DibiaseKing Kong BundySabuThe SheikTito SantanaNikolai VolkoffThe Iron SheikDon MuracoTony AtlasGeorge 'The Animal' SteeleHawkAnimalIvan KoloffGreg ValentineRick MartelOne Man GangTerry FunkDory Funk JrRicky MortonRobert GibsonKoko B WareBrian PillmanHarley RaceDynamite KidJimmy HartLou AlbanoThe Von Erichs - Kerry, Fritz, Kevin, Mike and DavidBob OrtonMr FujiIvan PutskiGame Modes:Exhibition CareerCreateTournamentMatch types:Singles 1 vs 13 way dance (a 3 person elimination match)4 way dance (a 4 person elimination match)Tag Team 2 vs 2Arenas:PacificMidwestSouthwestNortheastSoutheastWorldBacklotGymnasiumHotel and CasinoBeach ResortThe game spawned a sequel Legends of Wrestling II released at the end of 2002.
